reviewText: This disc is a DVD-R, not a pressed DVD, which means it costs more than it needs to and it is likely to have quality problems.  WTTW was also thoughtful enough to include the original commercials. :P  The disc is also letterboxed for 4:3 televisions, which means on today's sets, there is a black bar on the sides as well as the top and bottom.  Come on, WTTW.  Time to toss these old discs and remaster this wonderful program.

Geoffrey Baer does an incredible job of bringing the past to life. I'd grown up in St. Charles, Il, and had no idea of the fascinating history behind my old home town. Now, when I go back, I look at my little city with fresh eyes and renewed pride. He doesn't dwell too long in one area, so it moves along at a great pace without feeling rushed. I highly recommend to anyone who's interested in history.
Love all these videos. Learned a lot about the Fox valley area, Get the whole collection or wait for them on WTTW.
Loved this video about the Fox River Valley area! I have family that lives there - we all got a lot of history and information from this video. Highly recommend.
